verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> that came to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>;

And say <S%H559><s%> you unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the man <S%H376><s%> that obeys <S%H8085><s%> not the words <S%H1697><s%> of this covenant <S%H1285><s%>,

Which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from the iron <S%H1270><s%> furnace <S%H3564><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Obey <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H6680><s%>, according to all which I command you <S%H5971><s%>: so shall you be my people, and I will be your God <S%H430><s%>:

That I may perform <S%H6965><s%> the oath <S%H7621><s%> which I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> them a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>, as it is this day <S%H3117><s%>. Then answered <S%H6030><s%> I <S%H559><s%>, and said, So be it <S%H543><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H7121><s%>, Proclaim all these words <S%H1697><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and in the streets <S%H2351><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> you the words <S%H1697><s%> of this covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and do them <S%H6213><s%>.

For I earnestly <S%H5749><s%> protested <S%H5749><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought them up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, even unto this day <S%H3117><s%>, rising early <S%H7925><s%> and protesting <S%H5749><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Obey <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>.

Yet they obeyed <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H5186><s%>, nor inclined their ear <S%H241><s%>, but walked <S%H3212><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> in the imagination <S%H8307><s%> of their evil <S%H7451><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>: therefore I will bring <S%H935><s%> upon them all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this covenant <S%H1285><s%>, which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> them to do <S%H6213><s%>; but they did them not <S%H6213><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H7195><s%>, A conspiracy is found <S%H4672><s%> among the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and among the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

They are turned back <S%H7725><s%> to the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of their forefathers <S%H7223><s%>, which refused <S%H3985><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%>; and they went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> them <S%H1004><s%>: the house of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> have broken <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I made <S%H3772><s%> with their fathers <S%H1><s%>.

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, Behold <S%H935><s%>, I will bring evil <S%H7451><s%> upon them <S%H3201><s%>, which they shall not be able to escape <S%H3318><s%>; and though they shall cry <S%H2199><s%> unto me <S%H8085><s%>, I will not listen unto them.

Then shall the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> go <S%H1980><s%>, and cry <S%H2199><s%> unto the gods <S%H430><s%> unto whom they offer incense <S%H6999><s%>: but they shall not save <S%H3467><s%> them at all <S%H3467><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of their trouble <S%H7451><s%>.

For according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of your cities <S%H5892><s%> were your gods <S%H430><s%>, O Judah <S%H3063><s%>; and according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the streets <S%H2351><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> have you set up <S%H7760><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%> to that shameful thing <S%H1322><s%>, even altars <S%H4196><s%> to burn incense <S%H6999><s%> unto Baal <S%H1168><s%>.

Therefore pray <S%H6419><s%> not you for this people <S%H5971><s%>, neither lift up <S%H5375><s%> a cry <S%H7440><s%> or prayer <S%H8605><s%> for them <S%H8085><s%>: for I will not hear them in the time <S%H6256><s%> that they cry <S%H7121><s%> unto me for their trouble <S%H7451><s%>.

What has my beloved <S%H3039><s%> to do in my house <S%H1004><s%>, seeing she has done <S%H6213><s%> lewdness <S%H4209><s%> with many <S%H7227><s%>, and the holy <S%H6944><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> is passed <S%H5674><s%> from you <S%H7451><s%>? when you do evil, then you rejoice <S%H5937><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%>, A green <S%H7488><s%> olive tree <S%H2132><s%>, fair <S%H3303><s%>, and of good <S%H8389><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%>: with the noise <S%H6963><s%> of a great <S%H1419><s%> tumult <S%H1999><s%> he has kindled <S%H3341><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> upon it <S%H1808><s%>, and the branches of it are broken <S%H7489><s%>.

For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, that planted <S%H5193><s%> you <S%H1696><s%>, has pronounced evil <S%H7451><s%> against you <S%H1558><s%>, for the evil <S%H7451><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, which they have done <S%H6213><s%> against themselves to provoke me to anger <S%H3707><s%> in offering incense <S%H6999><s%> unto Baal <S%H1168><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given me knowledge <S%H3045><s%> of it <S%H3045><s%>, and I know it <S%H7200><s%>: then you showed me their doings <S%H4611><s%>.

But I was like a lamb <S%H3532><s%> or a ox <S%H441><s%> that is brought <S%H2986><s%> to the slaughter <S%H2873><s%>; and I knew <S%H3045><s%> not that they had devised <S%H2803><s%> devices <S%H4284><s%> against me <S%H7843><s%>, saying, Let us destroy the tree <S%H6086><s%> with the fruit <S%H3899><s%> there <S%H3772><s%>, and let us cut him off from the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>, that his name <S%H8034><s%> may be no more remembered <S%H2142><s%>.

But <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, that judge <S%H8199><s%> righteously <S%H6664><s%>, that test <S%H974><s%> the minds <S%H3629><s%> and the heart <S%H3820><s%>, let me see <S%H7200><s%> your vengeance <S%H5360><s%> on them <S%H1540><s%>: for unto you have I revealed my cause <S%H7379><s%>.

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of Anathoth <S%H6068><s%>, that seek <S%H1245><s%> your life <S%H5315><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Prophesy <S%H5012><s%> not in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, that you die <S%H4191><s%> not by our hand <S%H3027><s%>:

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, Behold <S%H6485><s%>, I will punish them <S%H970><s%>: the young men shall die <S%H4191><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>; their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> by famine <S%H7458><s%>:

And there shall be no remnant <S%H7611><s%> of them <S%H935><s%>: for I will bring evil <S%H7451><s%> upon the men <S%H582><s%> of Anathoth <S%H6068><s%>, even the year <S%H8141><s%> of their visitation <S%H6486><s%>.
